description: Super simple dashboard showing an overview of Kubernetes cluster autoscaling activity and status, using metrics reported by the autoscaler to Prometheus. Prometheus datasource can be chosen.

targets.expr:
avg(
    (kube_pod_container_info unless on (container, pod) kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})
    * on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace)
    kube_pod_info
) by(container, created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace)

avg(
    (kube_pod_container_info unless on (container, pod) kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"})
    * on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace)
    kube_pod_info
) by(container, created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace)

panels.description: Shows the nodes which are ready as a percent of the total nodes
panels.title: Nodes available

panels.description: Tells you if there are unscheduled pods
panels.title: Number of unscheduled pods

panels.description: Shows the evicted and unscheduled pods
panels.title: Pod activity

panels.description: Shows the state of the nodes as scaling happens
panels.title: Node activity
WorkerNode NoSchedule Metric countt (스케줄이 안되는 Node)
